acceptTrusteeship().details: Must be called by the next successor in line

declareIncapacity(address).details: Can be called by protectors, physicians (via attestation), or courts      Triggers succession to the next successor trustee

declineTrusteeship().details: Moves to the next successor in line

returns._0: Address of next successor (address(0) if none)
Array of successor addresses not yet called upon
True if succession is in progress

packedSelectors().details: Each selector is 4 bytes, packed sequentially with no padding      MUST NOT include packedSelectors() itself in the returned selectors      MUST be a pure function (no state access)

resignAsTrustee().details: Automatically triggers succession to next successor

restoreCapacity(address).details: Can be called by protectors or courts

triggerSuccession(string).details: Called when current trustee can no longer serve

acceptTrusteeship().notice: Accept trusteeship as a designated successor

declineTrusteeship().notice: Decline trusteeship as a designated successor

getActiveSuccessorIndex().notice: Get the current active successor index

getNextSuccessor().notice: Get the next successor trustee in line

isIncapacitated(address).notice: Check if a trustee is incapacitated

isSuccessionTriggered().notice: Check if succession has been triggered

packedSelectors().notice: Returns all function selectors for this facet as tightly packed bytes

restoreCapacity(address).notice: Restore capacity to a previously incapacitated trustee

triggerSuccession(string).notice: Trigger succession to the next successor trustee
